description: Falkirk claim a hard-fought win over Brechin City to reach the quarter-finals of the Scottish Cup.
title: Falkirk 2-1 Brechin City
maintext:
Falkirk claimed a hard-fought win over Brechin City to reach the quarter-finals of the Scottish Cup.
David McCracken nodded the Bairns in front from Luke Leahy's headed pass.
Gerry McLauchlan was fouled by Peter Grant in the box and Alan Trouten converted the penalty to draw Brechin level after the break.
However, a replay was avoided when David Smith struck from close range to give Falkirk the win and a place in Monday's draw.
